Name: Take the Throne
About the game: Take the Throne is a new Massive Multiplayer Online Battle Royale game with up to 25 players in a free-for-all bloody fight to be crowned and take the throne! Take the Throne is built on PvP encounters and is filled with comedic physics-based gameplay. FEATURES Official online battle royale servers with up to 25 players (regions in NA, soon to come in EU) Play online custom games with 2-10 friends Create a private, locally hosted battle royale lobby in which friends can join via a code 6 Unique Classes, each with their own abilities 15 Unique survival maps, 2 soccer maps, 2 capture the flag maps Advanced fighting mechanics (3 different types of swings, as well as 2 class abilities) Weapon hit force (the lower health you are, the further you get hit) Customize your character with 60+ skins (each with 4 different variations) and 100+ weapons (Some skins and weapons are only purchasable with crowns you get from winning the battle royale) Fully physics-based combat and incredibly funny ragdoll physics 30 PLAYER LOBBIES Take the Throne is a new Massive Multiplayer Online Battle Royale game with up to 25 players. Each round more players are eliminated until one player takes the throne! FUN FIGHTING MECHANICS Take the Throne combines ragdoll physics with advanced fighting mechanics and weapon hit force - where the lower health you are, the farther you get hit. SATISFYING PVP ENCOUNTERS Take the Throne is built on PvP encounters. Equip your weapon and have a choice at 3 different types of swings as well as unique class abilities! If you need to be on the defensive, use the block mechanic to avoid certain death! ENDLESS CUSTOMIZATION Take the Throne has thousands of skin/weapon combinations! Advancing further in the rounds/winning will allow you to purchase more skins or weapons.
